title: Hey all..
content:
[img]http://keengrid.net/keenrush/elephant.jpg[/img]

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] I found that picture of swimming baby elephant on some German site, resized it and added that stoopid text to make it look like traditional internet picture.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I and z-1 found this picture rather fun and crazy so hopefully it amuses you others too.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Hehe..3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Hey all..
content: This is so becoming my desktop background.

title: haha
content: I normally don't use the Keen smilies, but I think [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]  is fitting here.

title: Re: haha
content:
It looks edited because it is edited; "added that stoopid text". :P
The eyes do look very bright white, but it's a baby elephant, and babies tend to be brand new, no scars, stretch marks, worn teeth, or other blemishes that you inevitably get as you grow older yet.
It's not edited besides the text I'd say, minus some compression artifacts perhaps of course.Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: haha
content:
Yeah, the only edit I did was that text (and doubled the size, but I mentioned these both in my post already). [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I believe it's a real pic.. At least it was among other real-looking pictures.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: haha
content:
[img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/a/a4/Uglydog.jpg[/img] is a picture of Sam.

I had to look for a long time, especially because of the amount of toes Sam has, before I decided that that picture was in fact real, not something out of Jim Henson's Creature Shop, although that seemed at least just as likely.
Eventually I found the site where the picture came from (I saw it on a random forum hosted by a random free file host originally), and I was right.

My feelings when reading about that dog, and seeing his pictures, are still ambivalent however.
This world is a strange place!Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]
